title: MIME - IDHU ACTION MADAM
description: You have one minute to speak your piece, and everything will be determined within seconds. Energize yourselves, speak up without hesitation, and win with your words and tenacity.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: Each team can have 6 to 10 members.
Additional time will not be provided and the performance should not exceed the time limit.
Audio must be handed over to the event organizers prior to the event.
Vulgar acts, if involved will lead to elimination.
Acts centered on controversial or sensitive issues are prohibited.
